413620.name: Space Needle VR
413620.description:
Ready to jump? Explore the iconic Seattle Space Needle like never before. See the Seattle skyline from a new perspective. Bungee jump from the top and enjoy the adrenaline rush from the comfort of your own home. With this experience, you’ll also get a peek into areas restricted from public access. This version doesn't include the renovations.

If you want to experience the real thing, find the code inside and get the adventure going with $10 off a real-life tour of the Space Needle, exclusively for Expedia members!
Presented by Expedia Labs VR, Space Needle + Chihuly Garden and Glass, and WSP – Parsons Brinckerhoff of Seattle.
developers: Space Needle + Chihuly Garden and Glass
